                                  RemoteDevice d,
                                  ObjectIdentifier oid,
                                  PropertyIdentifier pid,
                                  UnsignedInteger propertyArrayIndex,
                                  RequestListener callback)
                                           throws BACnetException
        Sends a ReadProperty-Request and ignores Error responses where the class is Property and the code is unknownProperty. Returns null in this case.
        Throws:
        BACnetException

      • readProperties

        public static java.util.List<org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<ObjectPropertyReference,Encodable>> readProperties(LocalDevice localDevice,
                                                                                                    RemoteDevice d,
                                                                                                    java.util.List<ObjectPropertyReference> oprs,
                                                                                                    RequestListener callback)
                                                                                                             throws BACnetException
        This version of the readProperties method will preserve the order of properties given in the list in the results.
        Parameters:
        d - the device to which to send the request
        oprs - the list of property references to request
        Returns:
        a list of the original property reference objects wrapped with their values
        Throws:
        BACnetException
